titleStmt.title: An abridgement of the booke of acts and monumentes of the Church: written by that Reuerend Father, Maister Iohn Fox: and now abridged by Timothe Bright, Doctour of Phisicke, for such as either through want of leysure, or abilitie haue not the vse of so necessary an history
Actes and monuments. Abridgments.
titleStmt.author: Foxe, John, 1516-1587.

titleStmt.title: An abridgement of the booke of acts and monumentes of the Church: written by that Reuerend Father, Maister Iohn Fox: and now abridged by Timothe Bright, Doctour of Phisicke, for such as either through want of leysure, or abilitie haue not the vse of so necessary an history
Actes and monuments. Abridgments.
titleStmt.author: Foxe, John, 1516-1587.
Bright, Timothie, 1550-1615.

publicationStmt.publisher: By I. Windet, at the assignment of Master Tim Bright, and are to be sold at Pauls wharf, at the signe of the Crosse-keyes,

notesStmt.note: At foot of title: Cum gratia, & privilegio Regi√¶ Maiestatis.
The abridgement of the second volume has separate pagination, and register re-commences with AA.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
